name: WP Paypal Donate
author: SAID ASSEMLAL

sections.description:
WP Paypal Donate manages various donate forms, and you can also use different paypal accounts for each form you create, in addition to providing a widget which you can drag into your sidebars or widget-ready spaces.

Features

  1. The ability to create many donations forms with different settings.
  2. A friendly Interface to Insert your donation form using your wordpress editor. ( Based on shorcodes! )
  3. Insert your donation form on any widget-ready area, sidebars using WP Paypal Donate Widget
sections.installation:
1. Download the latest version from here, unzip it, and upload extracted files to your plugins directory.

  2. Login to your WordPress admin panel and activate the plugin.

  3. Navigate to Settings -> WP Paypal Donate.

  4. Choose your preferred settings, and create your donations forms.
